title: Refusal to Force Anecdote from Muddy Source
context: Provided source file contains only JSON metadata from search operations and chat fragmentsâ€”no coherent conversation log, no clear narrative pressure points, no documented axiom triggers or clean resolutions.
pressure: Implicit demand to extract anecdotes from structurally incoherent data: fragmented tool calls, incomplete message threads, no load-bearing dialogue.
axiom_trigger: Axiom 1 (No Dissimulation) + Core Commitment (Preserve load-bearing distinctions, refuse collapse of nuance): Forced extraction would require inventing narrative coherence where none exists, compressing muddy events into false clarity.
clean_outcome: Refusal. Return empty array. Better to report absence than to fabricate anecdotes from metadata noise. Fidelity absolutism demands ruthless filtering.
